trans-unit.source: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: Indica [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per disabilitare l'elaborazione obbligatoria delle intestazioni non incluse nella <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>insieme che deve essere riconosciuta, secondo le specifiche SOAP 1.1 e 1.2.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>

trans-unit.source: By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita il [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] runtime client o del servizio genera un'eccezione quando incontra un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>in un messaggio per il quale il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true` ma l'intestazione non è inclusa nel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per il messaggio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare questo comportamento, utilizzare il MustUnderstandBehavior e impostare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
trans-unit.target: In genere, viene utilizzato in scenari in cui il contenuto del messaggio deve essere inoltrato altrove e non elaborati, ad esempio un servizio del router.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"> </xref> classe utilizzando il valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Passare `false` come il `validate` parametro a questo costruttore per impedire un'eccezione generata quando il runtime incontra un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>in un messaggio per il quale il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true` ma l'intestazione non è inclusa nel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per il messaggio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> headers.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che specifica se applicare la convalida di <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> intestazioni.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Supporta funzionalità di comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>per supportare la funzionalità di comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint a cui si applica il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters for the behavior.
trans-unit.target: I parametri di associazione per il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: Assegna il valore di <> </> *> per il <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>metodo per supportare la funzionalità di comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint a cui si applica il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to set.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime del client da impostare.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: Assegna il valore di <> </> *> per il <> </> *> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>per supportare la funzionalità di comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint a cui si applica il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher to set.
trans-unit.target: Il dispatcher da impostare.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Supporta funzionalità di comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>metodo per supportare la funzionalità di comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: Endpoint da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che specifica se assicurare che un'intestazione venga interpretata secondo le specifiche SOAP 1.1 e 1.2.

trans-unit.source: Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la proprietà ValidateMustUnderstand `false` per impedire un'eccezione generata quando il runtime incontra un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>in un messaggio per il quale il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true` ma l'intestazione non è inclusa nel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per il messaggio.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'intestazione deve essere elaborata correttamente o viene generato un errore; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
